title: Arrays
concept: This level builds strong understanding of single-dimensional arrays, indexing, traversing using loops, accessing elements, summing values, finding smallest/largest elements, counting occurrences and filtering values. Always avoid extra spaces and print EXACT format expected.

challenges.title: Sum of Array
challenges.description: Read N and an array of N integers. Print their sum.
challenges.starterCode:
#include <stdio.h>
int main(){ int n, arr[200]; /* input array and print sum */ return 0; }

challenges.title: Maximum Element
challenges.description: Print the largest number in the array.
challenges.starterCode:
#include <stdio.h>
int main(){ int n, arr[200]; /* find max */ return 0; }

challenges.title: Minimum Element
challenges.description: Print the smallest number in the array.
challenges.starterCode:
#include <stdio.h>
int main(){ int n, arr[200]; /* find min */ return 0; }

challenges.title: Search the Element
challenges.description: Search for a given value X in array. If found print Yes else print No.
challenges.inputDescription: N, array of N integers, then X.
challenges.starterCode:
#include <stdio.h>
int main(){ int n, arr[200], x; /* search */ return 0; }

challenges.title: Count Occurrences
challenges.description: Count how many times X occurs in the array.
challenges.inputDescription: N, array of N integers, then X.
challenges.starterCode:
#include <stdio.h>
int main(){ int n, arr[200], x; /* count occurrences */ return 0; }

challenges.title: Sum of Even Numbers in Array
challenges.description: Sum only the even numbers in the array.
challenges.starterCode:
#include <stdio.h>
int main(){ int n, arr[200]; /* sum even numbers */ return 0; }

challenges.title: Reverse Array Print
challenges.description: Print the array elements in reverse order separated by spaces.
challenges.starterCode:
#include <stdio.h>
int main(){ int n, arr[200]; /* print reverse */ return 0; }

challenges.title: Second Largest
challenges.description: Print the second largest number in the array.
challenges.starterCode:
#include <stdio.h>
int main(){ int n, arr[200]; /* second largest */ return 0; }

challenges.title: Sorted or Not
challenges.description: If array elements are in non-decreasing order print Yes else No.
challenges.starterCode:
#include <stdio.h>
int main(){ int n, arr[200]; /* check sorted */ return 0; }

challenges.title: Frequency Table
challenges.description:
Given N and an array of N integers (range 0-9), print frequency of each digit from 0 to 9 on separate lines in format:
0:x
1:y
2:z
...
9:k
challenges.inputDescription: N followed by array of N integers in range 0-9.
challenges.starterCode:
#include <stdio.h>
int main(){ int n, arr[200]; int freq[10]={0}; /* frequency count */ return 0; }
